mapper.insert: insert into testrecptions (testreceptionid, testdate, status, patientid) values (#{testreceptionid},sysdate, #{status}, #{patientid})
mapper.select: select * from testreceptions tr, patients p, tests t where tr.patientid = p.patientid AND tr.testreceptionid = t.testreceptionid AND testdate between #{startdate} AND #{enddate} group by tr.testreceptionid
select testreceptionid, testdate, status, patientid from testreceptions where patientid = #{patientid} order by testdate desc
